rules.natural: If the show violates broadcasting guidelines, then either the show receives criticism or, provided that the show runs alcohol advertisements, the show does not have an alcohol company sponsor
Either the show violates broadcasting guidelines or the show faces controversy
If the show faces controversy, then either the show receives criticism or, under the condition that the show runs alcohol advertisements, the show does not have an alcohol company sponsor
Either the show gets fined, or the show loses sponsors, or, given that having a game segment does not result in the show being successful, the show does not change its format
Either the show faces a lawsuit or the show does not get fined
If the show receives complaints, then the show does not face a lawsuit
If the show moves to a different time slot, then the show does not get cancelled
If the show gets edited for content, then the show does not get cancelled
Either the show gets cancelled or the show does not have high ratings
If the show revamps its content, then the show does not maintain its ratings
If the show wins an award, then the show does not get cancelled
Either the show wins an award or the show gets renewed
If the show gets renewed, then the show does not get cancelled
If the show includes drinking scenes, then the show features alcohol content
If it is not true that having a game segment leads to the show being successful, then the show changes its format
Should neither the show move to a different time slot nor the show get edited for content occur, then the show becomes a cult hit
Provided that the condition that not having a game segment lead to success does not result in the show not changing its format is false, then the show maintains its ratings
If the show is not successful, then the show has high ratings
If the show is not successful, then the show includes drinking scenes
If the show is not successful, then the show has an alcohol company sponsor
If the show is not successful, then the show runs alcohol advertisements
If the show is not successful, then the show does not feature alcohol content
